query:
-- 1.2.6 Add cryptoAmount column to invoices table (DECIMAL 24,18 for wei-level precision)
-- 1.2.7 Add cryptoCurrency column to invoices table (VARCHAR 10, nullable)
ALTER TABLE `invoices`
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `cryptoAmount` DECIMAL(24,18) NULL,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `cryptoCurrency` VARCHAR(10) NULL;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user REX6DRAh92xmf1o.58be8e717db2 --database coKdAkLfsbebvczbYNFn3V --execute -- 1.2.6 Add cryptoAmount column to invoices table (DECIMAL 24,18 for wei-level precision)
-- 1.2.7 Add cryptoCurrency column to invoices table (VARCHAR 10, nullable)
ALTER TABLE `invoices`
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `cryptoAmount` DECIMAL(24,18) NULL,
  ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `cryptoCurrency` VARCHAR(10) NULL;
